column4: I recently tried to install the official nVidia drivers in ubuntu. Once installed, I was unable to boot the X server (at least using the official drivers). I can get X to boot using the "nv" driver, but that driver doesn't support OpenGL.
state your question, and someone might be able to help you

I recently tried to install the official nVidia drivers in ubuntu. Once installed, I was unable to boot the X server (at least using the official drivers). I can get X to boot using the "nv" driver, but that driver doesn't support OpenGL.
